articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The BBC finds that there have been a record number of days in 2023 that breached the 1.5C temperature limit.
articles.title: World breaches key 1.5C warming mark for record number of days

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.description: American Simone Biles becomes the most decorated gymnast in history after winning her second gold medal at the World Gymnastics Championships.
articles.title: Biles becomes most decorated gymnast in history

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Barriers have been a feature of every recent US presidential administration's border policies.
articles.title: US border walls are controversial - but are they effective?

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Right-wing parties look set to make big gains in state elections in Germany's wealthy south.
articles.title: Bavaria election: Toxic campaign heralds big vote for Germany's populists

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Both Steve Scalise and Jim Jordan are staunch conservatives - but have wildly different styles.
articles.title: House Republicans face choice between chaos and convention

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: "I need to focus on my health first," the rapper said, adding that he suffers from stomach issues.
articles.title: Rapper Drake taking break from music to focus on health

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The FTX co-founder tells court that Sam Bankman-Fried's public claims about FTX did not match reality.
articles.title: Tweet saying FTX was "fine" was false, court hears

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: A court in London has thrown out a legal case brought by a former lover of the ex-king of Spain.
articles.title: Juan Carlos: Court throws out ex-lover's €145m legal case

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Colorado officials say he is "always hungry" and "loves his belly scratches".
articles.title: 180kg Fred caught after going wild in the city

articles.description: Two Amazon satellites launch to test the tech for a global broadband system in the sky.
articles.title: Amazon Kuiper: Jeff Bezos joins satellite internet race
